::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod held up Scythe with one hand, and placed the Matrix inside
himself with the other. Hot Rod did not become Rodimus Prime.
The Matrix had been opened, and all it's wisdom power lost. Hot Rod will
keep the Matrix woth him. It should collect enough wisdom to turn him to
Rodimus Prime, in a month or so.
